channel.title: Leeching Problem
channel.description: :confused: Someone please help me to fix this problem , in my project insanity , hybrid pvp server. Its pvp based and some of my pkers have discovered that you can use every single leech at once and own everyone in wildly ? someone pleasse help in , teamviewer or something to put a limit on it , which is 3 leeches at a time. Thanks! appreciate it

item.title: Leeching Problem
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“Jacob_, post:2, topic:439950”]Why a limit? Why can’t you just fix the formula?[/quote]kk sure , anything that can stop , the abusing. thanks how may i do that ?
